translation.en: [man 1] This is your last chance to stop something very unpleasant from happening.
translation.de: Das ist eure letzte Chance, etwas sehr Unangenehmes zu verhindern.

translation.en: Wanna tell us where you hid the extra, Lyle?
translation.de: Verrätst du uns, wo es versteckt ist, Lyle?

translation.en: [Lyle] Eli, I'm sorry, mate.
translation.de: Eli, es tut mir leid, Kumpel.

translation.en: [man 1] Talk to me, Lyle!
I'm sorry, Frankie.
[man 1] Get him outta here.
-[Lyle wails] -[Frankie shouts] Lyle! Lyle! Lyle! Lyle!
[man 2] Little shit.
[Lyle] No, no, no! Stop hitting me!
-Call the police, somebody! -[man 2] Come on!
Somebody call the cops!
Don't put me in the fucking trunk! -Shut up! -Put me in the back seat!
translation.de: Nicht in den verdammten Kofferraum! Auf den Rücksitz!

translation.en: Get in! Shit.
I love you, Frankie!
Shut up!
No, no, no, no…
[man 2] Don't fuck with Ivan Kroll, ya fuckin' idiot.
translation.de: Leg dich nicht mit Ivan Kroll an, du verdammte Made.

translation.en: [Lyle] What the fuck?
Fuckin'…
Wait!
[Eli] You know, life is really different when you grow up in a family of outlaws.
translation.de: Das Leben ist wirklich anders, wenn man in einer Gauner-Familie aufwächst.

translation.en: [Eli] But even in a town like Darra,
translation.de: Aber selbst in einer Stadt wie Darra

translation.en: you still have school, homework, and doing what grown-ups say.
translation.de: gibt es Schule, Hausaufgaben und Dinge, die Erwachsene sagen.

translation.en: Although I reckon grown-ups can get confused,
to make the kind of bad decisions that land them in jail.
translation.de: und miese Entscheidungen treffen, die sie in den Knast bringen.

translation.en: Boys, wake up.
Slim'll be here soon.
Wake up.
[Eli] So I need to help my mum and stepdad avoid making those mistakes again,
translation.de: Ich muss meiner Mum und meinem Stiefvater helfen, diese Fehler zu vermeiden

translation.en: and stay on the straight and narrow.
-Mum, mum! Guess what! -What?
[Eli] Slim's gonna let me go down the main road this time.
translation.de: Slim lässt mich diesmal die Hauptstraße fahren.

translation.en: -[Frankie] Well, I trust you. -[Eli chuckles]
And he reckons I'm a much better driver than Lyle.
translation.de: Laut ihm fahre ich besser als Lyle.

translation.en: [Eli] What you makin'?
You know, I'm not entirely sure yet.
translation.de: Ich bin mir noch nicht ganz sicher.

translation.en: Maybe ask me later.
Looks good though.
Thanks.
[Eli] Our mum really is the best in the world.
translation.de: Unsere Mum ist die Beste der Welt.

translation.en: She's always tryin' to do what's best for me and my brother Gus,
translation.de: Für mich und meinen Bruder Gus will sie das Beste,

translation.en: and we're tryin' to get the best for her.
translation.de: und wir wollen das Beste für sie.

translation.en: Her only fault is being too trusting of people, but I'm not sure that's a fault.
translation.de: Nur vertraut sie Leuten zu sehr, aber ist das wirklich ein Fehler?

translation.en: Reckon the little fella wants to drive, eh?
[Eli] The idea of writing this letter actually came from Slim Halliday,
translation.de: Die Idee für diesen Brief kam von Slim Halliday,

translation.en: who you'd know from when he was in Boggo Road Gaol for murder.
translation.de: den man kennt, da er in Boggo Road Gaol für Mord einsaß.

translation.en: Our step-dad Lyle met Slim in prison as well,
translation.de: Unser Stiefvater Lyle traf Slim auch im Gefängnis,

translation.en: and these days, we call Slim our babysitter.
translation.de: und jetzt nennen wir Slim unseren Babysitter.

translation.en: Come on, budge up, then.
You all right? What's Gus writin'?
translation.de: Alles in Ordnung? Was schreibt Gus?

translation.en: [Eli] A lot of what my brother writes comes true eventually.
translation.de: Vieles, was mein Bruder schreibt, wird irgendwann wahr.

translation.en: He's probably the smartest person in the whole of Australia.
translation.de: Er ist wohl der klügste Mensch in Australien.

translation.en: But he hasn't actually spoken since he was seven years old.
translation.de: Aber er hat nicht gesprochen, seit er sieben Jahre alt war.

translation.en: "Your end is a dead blue wren."
translation.de: "Dein Ende ist ein toter blauer Zaunkönig."

translation.en: [Slim] Your what?
I dunno. None of it makes sense till after it's happened.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung. Es ergibt erst Sinn, wenn's passiert.

translation.en: Okay, let's get goin'. Remember what I told ya. Clutch in, ignition on.
translation.de: Ok, fahren wir. Weißt du noch? Kupplung rein, Zündung an.

translation.en: Okay. Okay. Up into first.
-[grinding] -And then stead'ly on the peddly.
translation.de: Und keine Randale auf der Pedale.

translation.en: Like that.
[Slim] Hey, come on.
-Let's get on the road. -Hey!
-You’re doing well, eh. -Oh!
That's it, hold it.
[woman 1] Jesus Christ!
[Slim] Whoa.
Yep. Now you're drivin'.
[Eli] So I started writing to Alex Bermuda.
translation.de: Ich fing an, Alex Bermuda zu schreiben.

translation.en: Like you said, he's only got four more years in prison if he keeps out of trouble.
translation.de: Er hat nur noch vier Jahre Haft, wenn er keinen Ärger macht.

translation.en: [Slim] Yeah, well, that's a big "if." [Eli] Is it really boring in prison?
'Cause I was wondering how you lasted 25 years.
translation.de: Ich frage mich, wie du 25 Jahre durchhieltest.

translation.en: [woman 2] Learn to fucking drive!
One thing you learn is how to master time.
translation.de: Man lernt, die Zeit zu nutzen.

translation.en: Slow it all down by focusing on the details
or you can speed it up by being so busy, not enough hours in the day.
translation.de: oder man beschäftigt sich nur. Die Zeit fliegt dann.

translation.en: Busy with what?
[Slim] Collecting cockroach shit, so you can sign your name with it.
translation.de: Man sammelt Kakerlakenkacke und schreibt seinen Namen.

translation.en: Make your bed, read some chapters of your book, play yourself at chess, then play the winner.
translation.de: Macht das Bett, liest in seinem Buch, spielt gegen sich Schach, dann Revanche.

translation.en: Go fishin' in your mind, down off Redcliffe Jetty.
translation.de: Geht in Gedanken angeln, in Redcliffe Jetty.

translation.en: Catch a big bloody flathead, cook it, watch the sun go down.
translation.de: Fängt einen Plattkopf, kocht ihn, betrachtet den Sonnenuntergang.

translation.en: -Brake. -Do what?
Brake!
Now you know what "give way" means.
Okay. Gear stick into neutral.
Ignition on.
Stead'ly on the peddly.
[Eli] According to Slim,
staying on the right side of the law is just like driving. [imitates Slim] "Stead'ly on the peddly."
translation.de: ist Gesetzestreue wie Autofahren. "Keine Randale auf der Pedale."

translation.en: Lyle, did you see me driving?
translation.de: Lyle, hast du mich fahren gesehen?

translation.en: I was full-on driving!
Yeah, mate. Hey. You'll make a bloody good driver one day, you will.
translation.de: Ja, Kumpel. Hey. Eines Tages wirst du ein verdammt guter Fahrer.

translation.en: -[Slim] Better driver than you, mate. -[Lyle] Right-o, Slim.
Cheers.
Hey, mate, what you got on tonight?
translation.de: Hey, Mann, was steht heute an?

translation.en: Frankie, she's doing her Jane Fonda class, and I got a few things I gotta take care of.
translation.de: Frankie macht ihren Jane-Fonda-Kurs, und ich muss was erledigen.

translation.en: Wondering if you could, uh, keep an eye on the rugrats.
translation.de: Könntest du auf die Kröten aufpassen?

translation.en: Make sure they do their homework, you know?
Yeah, anytime.
[Lyle] Good on you, mate.
Hey, bugalugs. Did you thank him?
translation.de: Hey, Kleiner. Hast du ihm gedankt?

translation.en: -[Eli] Oh! Cheers, Slim! -Yeah, bit bloody late now.
translation.de: -Oh! Danke, Slim! -Ja, das war etwas spät.

translation.en: [Eli] Mum, I drove all the way down to the cement factory.
translation.de: Mum, ich fuhr den ganzen Weg zur Zementfabrik.

translation.en: And I learned to give way.
[Frankie] Hey, slow down.
Wipe your feet. Stop running.
translation.de: Füße abputzen. Hör auf zu rennen.

translation.en: Closer to home, the Brisbane drug wars take a grisly turn.
translation.de: Der Drogenkrieg in Brisbane nimmt eine grausige Wendung.

translation.en: Caitlyn Spies from the Courier Mail has been following the story.
translation.de: Caitlyn Spies von der Courier-Mail verfolgt die Story.

translation.en: All we know so far is that the body of an unidentified man was found…
translation.de: Bisher wissen wir nur, man fand die Leiche eines unbekannten Mannes…

translation.en: Ah, Eli, turn that off.
[Caitlyn] …on a patch of waste ground near Stapleton,
missing his right arm.
Police have linked the killing to the ongoing conflict between rival Asian drug gangs,
translation.de: Die Polizei geht aus von einem Konflikt rivalisierender asiatischer Drogengangs

translation.en: and are asking anyone with any information to please come forward.
translation.de: und bittet jeden, der Informationen hat, sich zu melden.

translation.en: -[Eli] Mum! -It's just the news, Eli.
That was Caitlyn Spies.
I don't care if it was Mikhail Gorbachev. Do your homework.
translation.de: Könnte auch Michail Gorbatschow sein. Mach Hausaufgaben.

translation.en: Oh, shut up.
Boys, stop!
[chuckling] Eli, stop!
Lyle and I are going out later. Slim's babysitting.
translation.de: Lyle und ich gehen später aus. Slim passt auf.

translation.en: Out where?
To the cinema.
Hey, Slim, you're in the paper.
translation.de: Hey, Slim, du bist in der Zeitung.

translation.en: [Slim] Yeah, I saw that.
-[Eli] Is that the guy who put you away? -[Slim] Corrupt psycho that he was.
translation.de: -Ist das der Kerl, der dich wegsperrte? -Korrupter Psycho.

translation.en: So, did you actually kill that taxi driver, or didn't you?
translation.de: Hast du denn den Taxifahrer getötet oder nicht?

translation.en: [Slim] What do you think?
I dunno. I don't think you're a violent person.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung. Du wirkst nicht brutal.

translation.en: [Slim] Never underestimate what any man is capable of.
translation.de: Unterschätze nie, wozu ein Mensch fähig ist.

translation.en: So do you think Lyle's gone back to dealing smack?
translation.de: Glaubst du, Lyle dealt wieder mit Heroin?

translation.en: I dunno. Why don't you ask him?
translation.de: Keine Ahnung. Warum fragst du ihn nicht?

translation.en: I didn't wanna put him on the spot.
translation.de: Ich wollte ihn nicht in Verlegenheit bringen.

translation.en: He's doing his best, I suppose.
You're a good kid.
You reckon?
You just, you know, keep your nose clean, stay out of trouble.
translation.de: Halte dich aus allem raus, mach keinen Ärger.

translation.en: And you let Lyle deal with his own shit.
translation.de: Und lass Lyle seinen Mist klären.

translation.en: [Eli] Dear Alex.
There's a lot that goes unsaid in our kind of family,
translation.de: Vieles in unserer Familie bleibt ungesagt,

translation.en: either from trying to protect each other or just normal head-in-the-sand kind of stuff.
translation.de: sei es, um sich gegenseitig zu schützen, oder nach Vogelstrauß-Manier.

translation.en: I'd be interested to see where you stand between saying too much or saying too little.
translation.de: Mich würde interessieren, ob du zu viel oder zu wenig sagst.

translation.en: Strikes me that both can end really badly.
translation.de: Mir scheint, dass beides böse enden kann.

translation.en: Dear Eli, greetings from your pal Alex Bermuda
translation.de: Lieber Eli, Grüße von deinem Kumpel Alex Bermuda

translation.en: and the boys in B16.
Still can't get over you knowing Slim Halliday.
What a legend that man is.
translation.de: Was für eine Legende dieser Mann ist.

translation.en: In regards to getting involved in things outside of your control,
translation.de: Wenn es um Dinge geht, die man nicht kontrollieren kann,

translation.en: I've had a fair while to consider this myself.
translation.de: hatte ich Zeit, das zu überdenken.

translation.en: We're all social beings, it's natural to wanna pitch in for your mates.
translation.de: Wir sind soziale Wesen, es ist normal, sich für Freunde einzusetzen.

translation.en: But then, a lot of bad decisions are made emotionally in the heat of the moment.
translation.de: Aber vieles wird emotional im Affekt entschieden.

translation.en: Case in point, the screws took our TV the other day for some minor misdemeanor,
translation.de: Die Bullen nahmen uns neulich wegen Belanglosigkeiten den TV weg,

translation.en: and the result was pretty untidy.
[TV announcer] Like sands in the hourglass,
translation.de: Wie der Sand durch die Sanduhr

translation.en: so are the days of our lives.
[Alex] You can take a con's freedom,
translation.de: Man kann einem Häftling die Freiheit nehmen,

translation.en: take his rights, take his humanity,
but for God's sake,
don't take his Days of Our Lives.
[Frankie] ♪ Goodbye, Ruby Tuesday ♪
[Frankie] I have to check on the kids.
translation.de: Ich will nach den Kindern sehen.

translation.en: [Lyle] They're fine. Shh.
So, what was the movie?
translation.de: Was war es für ein Film?

translation.en: The one you were at last night.
Oh yeah, it was good.
Terms of Endearment.
So, what's it about?
It's a love story.
-Does it have a happy ending? -Mm, happy and sad.
translation.de: -Gibt es ein Happy End? -Glücklich und traurig.

translation.en: Eat your breakfast.
Hey, so my boss says it's all right to bring your kids to work, you know,
translation.de: Hey, mein Boss erlaubt es, deine Kinder mitzubringen,

translation.en: for the show and tell at school. Good news, eh?
translation.de: für die Schulpräsentation. Gute Neuigkeiten, was?

translation.en: Only problem is we're not your kids.
Yeah, well, it's also "bring an annoying little squirt to work" day,
translation.de: Es ist auch "Bring eine Nervensäge mit zur Arbeit",

translation.en: so I reckon you both qualify. Hm…
So, what did you think of the film last night?
translation.de: Wie fandest du den Film gestern Abend?

translation.en: -What'd we-- -Terms of Endearment.
Terms of Endearment.
Yeah, it was a real good one.
Real chick flick. -Mm-hmm. -Ask your mum about it.
-Hey? -[Frankie] Mm-hmm?
Where's my bloody, um-- Oh, thank you.
And me--
You're the best. Mwah!
All right, I'm offski. Have a good day at school, boys.
translation.de: Ok, ich gehe. Einen schönen Schultag, Jungs.

translation.en: You do know that's not physically possible, right?
translation.de: Du weißt, dass das unmöglich ist?

translation.en: Yeah, well, that is why it's the best preparation for life, mate.
translation.de: Ja, deshalb ist es die beste Vorbereitung aufs Leben.

translation.en: Do you think he's dealing again?
'Cause I think he's dealing again.
Yeah, well, not if she ends up on smack again.
translation.de: Nicht, wenn sie wieder Heroin nimmt.

translation.en: [Eli] Wanna take the shortcut?
Rack off, Astro Boy! This is our spot.
translation.de: Hau ab, Astro Boy! Das ist unser Platz.

translation.en: Come on, Gus. Just leave it.
Yeah, go on, then.
Gus, is it? We haven't met before.
translation.de: Gus, ja? Wir kennen uns nicht.

translation.en: I'm Poppy Birkbeck, the guidance counselor. Take a seat.
translation.de: Poppy Birkbeck, die Vertrauenslehrerin. Setz dich.

translation.en: I have to say,
you've certainly given my predecessors plenty to think about.
translation.de: du hast meinen Vorgängern viel zum Nachdenken gegeben.

translation.en: I mean, everyone's agreed, there's nothing wrong with you physically.
translation.de: Alle sind sich einig, dass du körperlich in Ordnung bist.

translation.en: Hearing's perfect,
and obviously nothing wrong with your brain,
judging by your academic record.
[breathes deeply] So… it's just the speaking we have a problem with.
translation.de: Es ist nur das Sprechen, womit wir ein Problem haben.

translation.en: Wonder if your artworks tell us something.
[Poppy] This was your still life.
And this was your still life with flowers.
translation.de: Und das war dein Stillleben mit Blumen.

translation.en: And a lot of these pictures have
this car in there.
Family group, Last Wave.
Those kids in the back.
Is that you and your brother?
translation.de: Bist du das mit deinem Bruder?

translation.en: Heading where?
If you can't say it, write it.
translation.de: Wenn du es nicht sagen kannst, schreib es.

translation.en: Or… draw it.
[opening drawer] I know it may seem pointless, Gus,
but I believe you and your brother have enormous potential,
translation.de: aber du und dein Bruder habt enormes Potenzial,

translation.en: were it not for some past trauma.
translation.de: wäre da nicht ein früheres Trauma.

translation.en: It could be your mother's addiction, her leaving your father,
translation.de: Es könnte die Sucht deiner Mutter sein, dass sie deinen Vater verließ,

translation.en: or something else you've decided to keep quiet about,
translation.de: oder etwas anderes, was dich schweigen ließ,

translation.en: in belief that silence will protect you.
translation.de: im Glauben, dass Schweigen dich schützt.

translation.en: Or someone.
And I'm here to say that silence rarely does that.
translation.de: Ich bin hier, um zu sagen, dass Schweigen das selten tut.

translation.en: Usually makes it worse.
Draw me what you're hiding, Gus.
translation.de: Zeichne mir, was du verbirgst, Gus.

translation.en: Hey, Tinker Bell.
Darren wants you at the back of the science lab.
translation.de: Darren will dich hinten beim Wissenschaftslabor sehen.

translation.en: Everything all right, Gus?
Hey. What's happening?
Hold out your hands and close your eyes.
He said hold out your hands. You brain-damaged or something?
translation.de: Du sollst die Hände ausstrecken. Bist du hirngeschädigt oder was?

translation.en: Oh, fuckin' hell!
-[Darren] I need you to hold him. -[boy] Do what you're told, bellend.
translation.de: -Du musst sie halten. -Tu, was man dir sagt, Arsch.

translation.en: You need to stretch him out more. One hand on his neck, one on his tail.
translation.de: Mehr dehnen. Eine Hand auf den Hals, eine auf den Schwanz.

translation.en: On the bin.
Tighter on his tail. You need to wrap your fist around it.
translation.de: Fester am Schwanz. Du musst deine Faust darum wickeln.

translation.en: What are you gonna-- Jesus, fuck!
translation.de: Was willst du… Meine Güte, Scheiße!

translation.en: It's my grandfather's. Samurai steel.
You're from Vietnam, Darren. There is no way you're descended from a samurai.
translation.de: Du bist aus Vietnam, Darren. Du stammst nicht von einem Samurai ab.

translation.en: [Darren] Well, my friend, that's what we're about to find out.
translation.de: Nun, mein Freund, das werden wir gleich herausfinden.

translation.en: Oh, for Christ's sake.
Don't piss your pants, I've practiced this.
translation.de: Mach dir nicht in die Hose, ich habe das geübt.

translation.en: Stay really still, and nothing bad will happen.
translation.de: Halt still, dann passiert nichts Schlimmes.

translation.en: Darren, this is nuts.
The mind's eye sees everything.
You'll hit my head or cut off one of my hands.
translation.de: Du triffst meinen Kopf oder meine Hand.

translation.en: -The true warrior does not waver. -They'll put you in juvie! [shouts]
translation.de: -Der wahre Krieger wankt nicht. -Du landest im Jugendknast!

translation.en: [man] Oi! What are you students doing?
What the bloody hell is going on here?
translation.de: Was zum Teufel ist hier los?

translation.en: Those lab rats are school property.
Come with me, pal.
So answer me this, Eli Bell.
In a country such as ours, blessed as it is with natural advantages,
translation.de: In einem Land wie unserem, gesegnet mit natürlichen Vorzügen,

translation.en: why our young folks should be so drawn to crime and petty misdemeanors?
translation.de: wieso neigen junge Leute da so zu Verbrechen und Vergehen?

translation.en: Uh, I don't know, sir, but I-- I personally blame a lack of physical exercise.
translation.de: -Ich weiß nicht, Sir, aber… -Ich gebe mangelndem Sport die Schuld.

translation.en: What were your friends doing behind the science block in the first place?
translation.de: Was haben deine Freunde hinter dem Labor gemacht?

translation.en: Smoking?
Playing with yourselves?
Oh, they're not my friends, sir. I was--
translation.de: Sie sind nicht meine Freunde, Sir, ich…

translation.en: Don't lie to me, Eli. You're really not very good at it.
translation.de: Lüg mich nicht an, Eli. Du bist nicht sehr gut darin.

translation.en: Who else was with you?
Oh, uh, they could've been from outside the school, actually.
One was big and fat and the other was a little Vietnamese guy.
translation.de: Einer war groß und fett, der andere ein kleiner Vietnamese.

translation.en: Yes, well, that's a fair description of half of my PE class.
translation.de: Ja, treffende Beschreibung für die Hälfte meiner Sportklasse.

translation.en: I'm gonna need names.
Drop your strides.
Uh, my-- my what, sir?
Your shorts, off.
All right, now bend over.
Come on! Bend over.
I'm not gonna tell you it won't hurt, 'cause hurting is the point.
translation.de: Ich sage nicht, dass es nicht wehtut, denn es geht genau darum.

translation.en: Punishment will cease when you tell me the name of your co-conspirators.
translation.de: Die Bestrafung endet, wenn du deine Mitverschwörer nennst.

translation.en: Mm, my what, sir?
Why does no one speak English? Your partners in crime.
translation.de: Warum spricht niemand Englisch? Deine Komplizen.

translation.en: -Your associates! -Ah! Jesus.
Jesus, I'm quite convinced,
-was neither fat nor Vietnamese. -[groaning]
Do we have a name yet?
[Alex] Regarding on how to deal with bullies, you really only have two options.
translation.de: Was den Umgang mit Mobbern angeht, gibt es nur zwei Optionen.

translation.en: Either keep out of their way or take matters into your own hands.
translation.de: Geh ihnen aus dem Weg, oder nimm die Sache selbst in die Hand.

translation.en: [Alex] Problem with option two being you never know how that's all going to end.
translation.de: Das Problem mit Option zwei ist, dass man nie weiß, wie das endet.

translation.en: So the closer I get to being released, the more I adhere to the prisoner's code.
translation.de: Je näher die Freilassung rückt, desto mehr halte ich mich an den Gefangenenkodex.

translation.en: Stay out of it,
don't rat on mates,
keep your trap shut.
Your silence is admirable, but it's misguided.
translation.de: Dein Schweigen ist bewundernswert, aber fehlgeleitet.

translation.en: I already know the answer, I just wanna hear you say it.
translation.de: Ich kenne die Antwort, ich will sie nur hören.

translation.en: Very well.
Gus, we shouldn't.
Lyle'll kill us if he finds us in here.
translation.de: Lyle bringt uns um, wenn er uns hier findet.

translation.en: Gus, we can't!
No one's been here since the thing with Mum.
translation.de: Seit der Sache mit Mum war niemand hier.

translation.en: [Eli] Come back.
-What are we supposed to do with Mum? -[Lyle] Sorry, mate.
translation.de: -Was sollen wir mit Mum machen? -Tut mir leid.

translation.en: -Lyle! -I'll be back, I-- I promise.
[Lyle] I gotta get myself straightened out. I'll be back, I promise, mate.
translation.de: Ich muss runterkommen, ok? Ich komme wieder, versprochen.

translation.en: [echoes] I'm sorry, mate!
Gus, Lyle's back!
Hello, mate! [laughs]
Let me look at you.
How's Frankie? Still pretty bad.
All right, let's go get her sorted. [echoes]
translation.de: Ok, kümmern wir uns um sie.

translation.en: [Frankie] Boys, boys, boys, boys…
Boys!
Boys! Boys! [screaming]
[screaming] You fucking arsehole! Fuck!
You're a fucking pig! Fuck!
translation.de: Du bist ein verdammtes Schwein! Scheiße!

translation.en: I fucking hate you!
[Frankie sobbing] Boys, help me! Boys!
Don't do this to me. Don't do this to me.
-Please. -[Lyle] Boys, it's gonna be all right.
Boys. Boys.
I know you can fucking hear me!
translation.de: Ich weiß, dass ihr mich hören könnt!

translation.en: Fuck you! Fuck you all!
Fuck! Fuck you! [echoes]
How did you know about this?
This is insane.
For what? What are we waiting for?
[Eli] Don't answer it!
[man] Eli.
-Eli? -Who is this?
I'll give you three guesses.
No idea. Is this Alex?
There's a million Alexes.
He's my pen friend, doing time in Boggo Road Gaol.
translation.de: Er ist mein Brieffreund und sitzt im Boggo Road Gaol.

translation.en: Slim introduced us. I guess any friend of the taxi driver killer…
translation.de: -Slim stellte uns vor. -Ein Freund des Taxifahrermörders…

translation.en: He didn't kill that guy!
If Slim's your babysitter, he'd have to say that.
translation.de: Als euer Babysitter muss Slim das sagen.

translation.en: My mum said he didn't, and my mum's not capable of lying.
translation.de: Meine Mum sagt es auch, und sie lügt nie.

translation.en: Everybody lies, the saints and the sinners.
translation.de: Alle lügen, die Heiligen und die Sünder.

translation.en: The trick is knowing which one you're talking to. Good luck, Eli.
translation.de: Man muss nur wissen, mit wem man redet. Viel Glück, Eli.

translation.en: [Lyle] You two better not be down there.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, ihr seid nicht unten.

translation.en: [Eli] Oh, no! Come on, Gus.
[Lyle] Oi! You little mongrels, get back up here right now!
translation.de: Hey! Ihr kleinen Bastarde, kommt her!

translation.en: -Go, Gus! -Don't you do that, Gus! Gus!
-Eli! -[Eli] Go, Gus, move!
[Lyle] Get up here right now, you two little mongrels!
translation.de: Kommt sofort her, ihr zwei Bastarde!

translation.en: What's happening?
The fucking kids are in the emergency tunnel!
Right, boys, this is it. You're in big shit.
translation.de: Ok, Jungs, es reicht. Ihr kriegt Ärger.

translation.en: What are you gonna do?
Ugh. If they don't bury themselves alive, I'll fuckin' murder 'em.
translation.de: Wenn sie sich nicht lebendig begraben, bringe ich sie um.

translation.en: Lyle, go easy on them.
Gus, wait for me!
Gus! Gus!
Gus, I'm stuck! Gus, come back.
translation.de: Gus, ich stecke fest! Gus, komm zurück.

translation.en: [Frankie] Uh, just make sure they're safe, will ya?
translation.de: Sorg dafür, dass sie sicher sind.

translation.en: [Eli] Something-- It smells like poo!
Where are we?
You're right where you belong, you little wankers.
translation.de: Da, wo ihr hingehört, ihr kleinen Wichser.

translation.en: You're very lucky you both weren't buried alive.
Now come on out.
-Rack off. You'll give us a floggin'. -Dead fuckin' right, I am, mate.
translation.de: -Hau ab. Du wirst uns vermöbeln. -Na klar, Mann.

translation.en: -Well, fuck that, then. -Don't swear!
-You just did. -Yeah, well, I'm an adult, aren't I?
translation.de: -Du tust es auch. -Ich bin erwachsen, oder?

translation.en: You tell me, Lyle. I thought adults were supposed to learn from their mistakes.
translation.de: Sag mal, Lyle. Ich dachte, Erwachsene lernen aus ihren Fehlern.

translation.en: You and Mum are dealing again. It's the truth, innit?
translation.de: Du und Mum dealt wieder. So ist es, oder?

translation.en: Just announce it to the whole bloody neighborhood, won't you?
translation.de: Verkünde es doch der ganzen Nachbarschaft, ja?

translation.en: Here. Now, get a hold of that
before you both get bloody polio or hepatitis.
translation.de: bevor ihr Kinderlähmung oder Hepatitis kriegt.

translation.en: Fuck you, Lyle. We spoke to that bloke on the phone.
translation.de: Fick dich, Lyle. Dieser Typ rief an.

translation.en: -How come he knows my name? -What bloke?
There's no bloke on the phone. It's not even connected!
translation.de: Da war keiner. Es ist nicht angeschlossen!

translation.en: Me and Gus deserve some answers!
You know what? You deserve to stay down there
translation.de: Du verdienst es, da unten zu bleiben,

translation.en: until you, little man, learn some bloody manners.
translation.de: bis du, kleiner Mann, verdammte Manieren gelernt hast.

translation.en: Has Lyle got Mum using again?
translation.de: Nimmt Mum wegen Lyle wieder Drogen?

translation.en: Fucking Lyle.
[Lyle] Just let her rant and rage, okay, boys?
translation.de: Lasst sie einfach rumwüten, ok, Jungs?

translation.en: I know it's difficult, but we just gotta wait around, okay?
translation.de: Ich weiß, es ist schwer, aber wir müssen abwarten, ok?

translation.en: [Frankie] He's tryin' to kill me, Eli.
Call the cops! He's tryin' to kill me.
translation.de: Ruft die Polizei! Er will mich umbringen.

translation.en: Call them and tell he's gonna murder me.
translation.de: Ruf sie an und sag ihnen, dass er mich töten wird.

translation.en: [Lyle] You can't help her, mate.
[grunts] Hey.
Group…
Group hug.
You think he's gone out yet?
I'm sorry, Frankie.
Pretty crappy at this dad stuff.
No.
You're great, Lyle.
We'd have been up shit creek without a paddle if you hadn't given us a home.
translation.de: Wir würden in der Scheiße stecken, hättest du uns nicht aufgenommen.

translation.en: -Not much of a home though, is it? -Yes, it is.
The boys worship you.
And I kinda like you too.
[Eli] Come on, give me a leg up. Come on, Gus…
translation.de: Los, nimm mein Bein. Komm schon, Gus…

translation.en: Don't, Gus! I'm falling!
Gus! [grunts]
[Eli] Come on, Gus, push!
Ah, where are the bloody buttons on this thing?
You boys learned your lesson?
Is Lyle still mad at us?
Yeah, no, he's settled. He's watching the footy.
translation.de: Ja, er ist ok. Er guckt Fußball.

translation.en: So he's not gonna flog us?
Not if you say you're sorry.
"Act of having it off," ten letters.
Something, something, "P," something, "T."
-[Eli] Mum. -[Frankie] Mm?
Just promise you and Lyle aren't using again.
translation.de: Versprich, dass ihr keine Drogen mehr nehmt.

translation.en: I promise.
"Family embrace," five and three.
Excuse me.
-[kisses] -Good night.
Why did you run away from our dad?
translation.de: Warum bist du vor unserem Dad weggelaufen?

translation.en: [Frankie] Eli, it's late. I don't wanna talk about Robert right now.
translation.de: Eli, es ist spät. Ich will jetzt nicht über Robert reden.

translation.en: He did bad things, didn't he?
We all do bad things sometimes.
Alcoholism is a disease.
He wasn't a well man.
Was he a good man?
He was a good dancer.
-Was he more like me or more like Gus? -I don't know, Eli.
translation.de: -War er eher wie ich oder wie Gus? -Ich weiß nicht, Eli.

translation.en: He was… like both of you.
Was he scary sometimes?
Like Gus is scary.
Gus isn't scary.
Yes, he is.
Yeah? In what way?
I dunno. It's the stuff he writes in the air with his magic finger.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht. Die Sachen, die er mit seinem magischen Finger schreibt.

translation.en: It's like he can hop forwards through time and send back messages from the future.
translation.de: Als könnte er durch die Zeit springen und Nachrichten aus der Zukunft schicken.

translation.en: Maybe he can.
You ever considered that possibility?
All I know is that boy loves you more than he can say.
translation.de: Ich weiß nur, dass der Junge dich mehr liebt, als er sagen kann.

translation.en: When you were born, he guarded your crib like all human life depended on it.
translation.de: Als du geboren wurdest, bewachte er dein Bett, als hinge alles Leben davon ab.

translation.en: He's the best friend you'll ever have.
translation.de: Du findest nie einen besseren Freund.

translation.en: And you're the best mum.
translation.de: Und du bist die beste Mutter.

translation.en: Nah.
Probably a bit below average, but that's very kind of you to say.
translation.de: Etwas unter dem Durchschnitt, aber das ist nett von dir.

translation.en: No, really, you're too good for this shitty place.
translation.de: Nein, du bist zu gut für diesen Scheißort.

translation.en: You were too good for Dad, and now you're too good for Lyle.
translation.de: Du warst zu gut für Dad und jetzt für Lyle.

translation.en: [Frankie] Don't.
[Eli] You could've been a teacher or a school counselor,
translation.de: Du hättest Lehrerin oder Beraterin werden können,

translation.en: not living with some drop-kick heroin pusher.
translation.de: statt mit einem Drogendealer zu leben.

translation.en: That's enough. Go to bed.
[whispering] I'm going after him.
Check where he goes. You coming?
translation.de: Mal sehen, wo er hingeht. Kommst du?

translation.en: [Darren] Don't move.
Tink, if you're gonna be a ninja, last thing you wanna wear
translation.de: Tink, als Ninja solltest du keinen blauen Pyjama tragen,

translation.en: is blue pajamas with half your arse hangin' out.
translation.de: aus dem dein halber Hintern raushängt.

translation.en: I can see your Aussie white bum flashing on and off like a fuckin' lighthouse.
translation.de: Ich seh deinen weißen Po wie einen Leuchtturm leuchten.

translation.en: [sighs] Hi, Darren.
You know, if I chopped your head off, your brain'd stay alive for three minutes.
translation.de: Ohne Kopf würde dein Hirn noch drei Minuten leben.

translation.en: You could carry on talking till you lost all consciousness.
translation.de: Du laberst weiter, bis du bewusstlos wirst.

translation.en: I don't think that's true.
Only one way to find out.
Did you shit yourself?
Almost.
What's Lyle doing here?
I reckon he's collecting heroin from your mum.
translation.de: Ich nehme an, er holt sich Heroin von deiner Mum.

translation.en: Very good, bellend. Who else knows what he's up to?
translation.de: Sehr gut, Arsch. Wer weiß noch, was er vorhat?

translation.en: The guy on the phone, maybe.
What guy on the phone?
There was a guy on the phone. I spoke to him by accident.
translation.de: Da war einer am Telefon. Ich sprach zufällig mit ihm.

translation.en: He seemed to know what was going on.
translation.de: Er schien zu wissen, was abgeht.

translation.en: Could've been Ivan Kroll.
-Who's Ivan Kroll? -Just an arsehole with a motorbike.
translation.de: -Wer ist Ivan Kroll? -Nur ein Arschloch mit Motorrad.

translation.en: You see on the news about that bloke who lost an arm?
translation.de: Die Nachrichten über den, der einen Arm verlor?

translation.en: That was probably Ivan's work.
Wanna eat something?
-I'll be all right. -You better come in.
Be rude not to.
Shoes off, dick wad.
Check this out.
Go on, have a look.
[woman] …so much money. It's the best.
translation.de: …so viel Geld. Es ist das Beste.

translation.en: [Eli] So when did Lyle go back to dealing smack?
[Darren] What makes you think he ever stopped? He just moved up the ladder.
translation.de: Wie kommst du darauf, dass er aufhörte? Er ist nur aufgestiegen.

translation.en: Sucks, doesn't it? Thinking you're with the good guys
translation.de: Scheiße, oder? Du denkst, du bist bei den Guten,

translation.en: and discovering you're the bad guys.
[woman] Darren!
-Come, she'd like to meet you. -Oi!
Found this one spying in the yard.
-The one who didn't rat about the rat. -Eli, what are you doin' here?
translation.de: -Der bei der Ratte dichthielt. -Eli, was machst du hier?

translation.en: Darren invited me.
It's 1:00 in the morning. Go home!
translation.de: Es ist ein Uhr. Ab nach Hause!

translation.en: -'Kay, I'm going. -You always give up that easy?
translation.de: -Ok, ich gehe. -Gibst du immer so schnell auf?

translation.en: Why did you come here?
Because he's an idiot.
-Just followed Lyle. -[Lyle] Mm.
Because?
You have question for him.
translation.de: Du hast eine Frage an ihn.

translation.en: -Okay, that's enough, guys. -I say when it's enough.
Okay.
Come here, boy.
Closer.
Why don't you ask Lyle
your most important question?
I'll make sure that he answer truthfully.
translation.de: Ich sorge dafür, dass er wahrheitsgemäß antwortet.

translation.en: Why are you dealing drugs again?
-For the money, mate. -So why are we still poor?
translation.de: -Fürs Geld, Kumpel. -Warum sind wir dann noch arm?

translation.en: I said one question.
Now it's my turn.
Why didn't you rat on my son?
translation.de: Warum hast du meinen Sohn nicht verpfiffen?

translation.en: It's the prisoner's code. Stay out of it, keep your trap shut.
translation.de: Das ist der Gefangenenkodex. Raushalten und Klappe halten.

translation.en: [woman] You taught him well.
translation.de: Du hast es ihm gut beigebracht.

translation.en: You can both leave now.
Okay.
Bring him back another time.
Maybe we talk about work opportunity.
translation.de: Vielleicht reden wir über eine Jobsache.

translation.en: Okay, thank you.
[woman] Eli?
When he say it just for the money,
translation.de: Wenn er sagt, es geht nur ums Geld,

translation.en: the money is for your family.
translation.de: dann ist das Geld für deine Familie.

translation.en: He's doing this because he loves you.
translation.de: Er tut das, weil er dich liebt.

translation.en: [in Vietnamese] Off to bed.
[in English] Lyle.
Lyle, come back.
Please, Lyle!
Don't you ever follow me again, you hear?
-[Eli] Lyle! Lyle! -[Lyle] That was really embarrassing.
[crying] You're embarrassed? Lyle, you're a fucking drug dealer!
translation.de: Dir ist es peinlich? Lyle, du bist Drogendealer!

translation.en: I mean, what the fuck is it with you and Mum?
translation.de: Was zum Teufel ist das mit dir und Mum?

translation.en: "Do your homework! Eat your broccoli! Tidy the kitchen!"
translation.de: "Mach Hausaufgaben! Iss den Brokkoli! Räum die Küche auf!"

translation.en: I mean, like, Mum's an addict,
and you're the idiot who got her hooked!
translation.de: und du bist der Idiot, der sie süchtig machte!

translation.en: Righto, come on, let's go, mate.
Oh, what-- Get up, Eli. What are you doing? Get up.
translation.de: Was… Steh auf, Eli. Was tust du? Steh auf.

translation.en: -Get up! -I can't.
You're just gonna push me down again.
Don't cry, you great big pussy. What are you crying for?
translation.de: Heul nicht, du Weichei. Warum weinst du?

translation.en: I don't know.
I just got a whole lot of tears inside me.
translation.de: Ich habe so viele Tränen in mir.

translation.en: I can't help it.
Here, clean yourself up.
Take it.
Now, I know dealin' smack is a shitty way to make a livin',
translation.de: Ich weiß, dass Heroin-Dealen eine Scheißart ist, Geld zu verdienen,

translation.en: but no one gets rich doing an honest job anymore.
translation.de: aber mit ehrlicher Arbeit wird keiner reich.

translation.en: -That's kinda what Darren said. -Oh, did he, now?
Honestly.
Pretty soon, mate, we're gonna be away from this place.
translation.de: Bald sind wir weg von hier.

translation.en: Things are gonna get good, I promise.
Things are gonna get so good you'll forget they were ever bad.
translation.de: Es wird so gut, dass du vergisst, dass es mal schlecht war.

translation.en: You ever wondered why you cry so easily?
translation.de: Hast du dich mal gefragt, warum du so schnell weinst?

translation.en: 'Cause I'm a pussy.
No, because you're a good kid, and don't you ever be ashamed of crying.
translation.de: Nein, weil du ein guter Junge bist, und schäme dich nie fürs Weinen.

translation.en: You cry because you give a shit.
People that don't cry, they don't give a shit,
translation.de: Leuten, die nicht weinen, ist alles egal,

translation.en: and God knows there's enough of them fuckwits at large in the world.
translation.de: es gibt genug von den Ärschen auf der Welt.

translation.en: You good?
You done crying?
Yep.
All right, let's go home.
[whispering] Right, mate, straight to bed, okay?
translation.de: Ok, Kumpel, direkt ins Bett, ok?

translation.en: Mum isn't using, but Lyle's dealing like we thought.
translation.de: Mum nimmt nichts, aber Lyle dealt, wie wir dachten.

translation.en: And Bich Dang offered me a job.
translation.de: Bich Dang bot mir einen Job an.

translation.en: I reckon we can help him.
You know, go into business together, make a shitload of money,
translation.de: Wir machen zusammen Geschäfte, verdienen viel Kohle,

translation.en: finally get the cash to move Mum away from here.
translation.de: genug Geld, um Mum hier wegzubringen.

translation.en: What do you reckon?
I'm gonna be dead tomorrow.
[Slim] This is a test. No test is worth anything unless it's difficult to pass.
translation.de: Das ist ein Test. Kein Test ist was wert, wenn er nicht schwer ist.

translation.en: And this is yours.
[Eli] Bobby!
You look how happy your mum is. Why would you want anyone to risk that?
translation.de: Schau, wie glücklich deine Mum ist. Warum alles ruinieren?

translation.en: Robert's your father.
Are you all right, Dad? Whoa!
[Lyle] It's gonna get better, Frankie.
It's gonna get so good you'll forget it was ever bad.
translation.de: Du vergisst, dass es schlecht war.

translation.en: [Darren] Ivan Kroll is a bogeyman to keep everyone in line.
translation.de: Ivan Kroll ist ein Buhmann, der alle im Zaum hält.

translation.en: [Slim] Any word of Lyle?
[Eli] No, but I'll find him before anything bad happens to him.
translation.de: Nein, aber ich finde ihn, bevor ihm etwas zustößt.

translation.en: [Slim] Sometimes bad things happen to get good things.
I promise you that our sacred mission has only just begun.
translation.de: Ich verspreche, dass unsere heilige Mission erst begonnen hat.

translation.en: [Eli] Where's my mum?
[Slim] Your mum is in prison.
I wanna see my boys!
-Are you real? -[Eli] It's not a dream, Mum.
translation.de: -Bist du echt? -Es ist kein Traum, Mum.

translation.en: It's just you and me, Gus. No one's going to help us.
translation.de: Es gibt nur uns, Gus. Niemand wird uns helfen.

translation.en: Caitlyn Spies? I'm Eli Bell.
translation.de: Caitlyn Spies? Ich bin Eli Bell.

translation.en: You and me, we're the daylight.
translation.de: Du und ich, wir sind das Tageslicht.

translation.en: [Frankie] Sending our boys out into the world, it's something to be proud of.
translation.de: Unsere Jungs in die Welt zu schicken, macht einen stolz.

translation.en: [Slim] Pain and pleasure's all part of being human.
translation.de: Schmerz und Vergnügen gehören zum Menschsein.

translation.en: And if it doesn't hurt, not real life, mate.
translation.de: Tut es nicht weh, ist es nicht real.

translation.en: All you have to do is believe.
